issue.title: Gazebo issues on Sourceforge playerstage issue tracker

content.raw:
The issues are gazebo issues from when gazebo was sharing the player project bug tracker.  Some of them are Player interface bugs, some aren't.  When Sourceforge comes back up, you can go through the reports at: 
http://sourceforge.net/p/playerstage/bugs
http://sourceforge.net/p/playerstage/patches

Most of the gazebo bugs are either assigned to Nate or have the tag "gazebo".  There's something like 20-30 open bugs and patches hanging around.  A lot of them are a couple of years old and may not be valid anymore, but I'd rather let you guys judge than try to go through them myself.

Most of the gazebo bugs are either assigned to Nate or have the tag "gazebo". There's something like 20-30 open bugs and patches hanging around. A lot of them are a couple of years old and may not be valid anymore, but I'd rather let you guys judge than try to go through them myself.
